itunes:title: Episode 1020 - Special Guest Chris Gronkowski
title: Episode 1020 - Special Guest Chris Gronkowski
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Former University of Arizona and Dallas Cowboys fullback Chris Gronkowski joins the show to talk about his brother Rob's future with the Tampa Bay Buccaneers and Tom Brady, how hard Papa Gronk parties, his experience with Bruce Arians as a coach, what he...
itunes:summary:
Former University of Arizona and Dallas Cowboys fullback Chris Gronkowski joins the show to talk about his brother Rob's future with the Tampa Bay Buccaneers and Tom Brady, how hard Papa Gronk parties, his experience with Bruce Arians as a coach, what he thinks about Byron Leftwich getting passed over for the Bucs job, his experience on the show 'Shark Tank', and the Gronks' new drinkware line with Drinkin Bros.
